channel.title: Latest News on Laughman's Voloblog about CloudNative/AR/VR/CV
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on Laughman's Voloblog about CloudNative/AR/VR/CV

item.title: Istio 1.8: A Virtual Machine Integration Odyssey
item.description: In this article, I’ll give you an overview of Istio‘s history of virtual machine integration support. In particular, the introduction of the smart DNS proxy and WorkloadGroup in Istio 1.

item.title: What is a service mesh?
item.description: A service mesh is a relatively simple concept, consisting of a bunch of network proxies paired with each service in an application, plus a set of task management processes.

item.title: Istio 1.8: A Smart DNS Proxy Takes Support for Virtual Machines a Step Further
item.description: 1.8 is the last version of Istio to be released in 2020 and it has the following major updates: Supports installation and upgrades using Helm 3.

item.title: How to Integrate Virtual Machines into Istio Service Mesh
item.description: Istio is a popular service mesh to connect, secure, control, and observe services. When it was first introduced as open source in 2017, Kubernetes was winning the container orchestration battle and Istio answered the needs of organizations moving to microservices.

item.title: New Beginning - Goodbye Ant, Hello Tetrate
item.description: Today is my 914th day and also the last day with Ant Group, tomorrow is September 1st, which is usually the day school starts, and everyone at Alibaba is known as “classmate”, tomorrow I will join Tetrate, and that’s kind of starting my new semester!

item.title: Sidecar injection and transparent traffic hijacking process in Istio explained in detail
item.description: Based on Istio version 1.5.1, this article will present the following. What is the sidecar pattern and what advantages does it have?

item.title: Service Mesh - the Microservices in Post Kubernetes Era
item.description: This article is a rework of previously written content and is included in the Istio Handbook of the ServiceMesher community .

item.title: Cloud Native Sandbox
item.description: Github: https://github.com/rootsongjc/cloud-native-sandbox Cloud Native Sandbox can help you setup a standalone Kubernetes and istio environment with Docker on you own laptop.

item.title: Understanding How Envoy Sidecar Intercept and Route Traffic in Istio Service Mesh
item.description: This article uses Istio’s official bookinfo example to explain how Envoy performs routing forwarding after the traffic entering the Pod and forwarded to Envoy sidecar by iptables, detailing the inbound and outbound processing.

item.title: Cloud Native and me - the past, current and future
item.description: Today I am honored to announce that I have become a CNCF Ambassador. Here is my story with Cloud Native.

item.title: High Level Cloud Native From Kevin Hoffman
item.description: Kevin Hoffman(From Capital One, twitter @KevinHoffman) was making a speech on TalkingData T11 Smart Data Summit. He addressed that 15 Factors of Cloud Native which based on Heroku’s original Twelve-Factor App, but he add more 3 another factors on it.
